com.bmd.android.collection.filter

Class Filters

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bmd.android.collection.filter.Filters

  • public class Filters
extends Object
    Utility class providing helper methods for creating and managing Filter objects.

    Created by davide on 3/11/14.

      • containedIn

        public static <E> Filter<E> containedIn(ToIntTranslator<E> translator,
                        int[] values)
        Creates a filter matching all the int values contained in the specified array.
        Type Parameters:
        E - the filtered element type.
        Parameters:
        translator - the translator transforming into an int value the sparse iterable element.
        values - the values to match.
        Returns:
        the new filter.

      • inverse

        public static <E> Filter<E> inverse(Filter<E> filter)
        Creates a filter which is the inverse of the specified one. That is, all the originally matching elements will not match anymore and viceversa.
        Type Parameters:
        E - the filtered element type.
        Parameters:
        filter - the original filter.
        Returns:
        the inverted filter.

      • inverse

        Parameters:
        filter - the original filter.
        Returns:
        the inverted filter.
